name: PDXSpaceBrawl
description:
Note: only Android OS supported.

Hi everybody!
Out NOW PDXSpaceBrawl, another game from PDXSoft, made with Game Maker Studio 2.
Brawl in space against 7 CPU controlled space ships, while the time is running. When the time runs out, the ship that destroyed the other ships more times is the winner!! NOW there is multiplayer support from 2 to 8 players online!!
Features:
1) Fully touchable control scheme: drag your finger on the screen to move and rotate your ship, touch 2 times to shoot a laser (now there is also Shoot buttons!!), and release your finger to stop the ship;
2) Pause/Unpause button (during offline gameplay);
3) Dynamic spacial sound effects, the battle happens around your ship!
4) Customizable player ship color, player ship max speed, player shot speed, CPU controlled ships max speed, CPU shots speed, toggle audio on/off, game timer, and Complete with Bots (for multiplayer gameplay);
5) Banner ads in the top of the screen;
6) Colored lines reveal opponent ships direction from your ship;
7) Multiplayer matchmaking modes Automatch, and Invite players;
8) Offline and online Leaderboards;
9) Like, rate, comment and share to show your passion for PDXSoft games!! :)
